title: La Moncloa. 08/05/2019. Nadia Calviño to become chair of European Bank of Reconstruction and Development's board of governors [Government/News]
snippet: The acting minister will take on the chair of the board of governors until its next annual assembly in May 2020. She replaces the Vice-President of the European Commission, Jyrki Katainen, in this rotating position.

title: Nadia Calviño - Wikipedia
snippet: Nadia María Calviño Santamaría (Spanish: [ˈnaðja kalˈβiɲo]; born 3 October 1968) is a Spanish economist and civil servant serving as the President of the European Investment Bank since January 2024. From June 2018 to December 2023, Calviño was part of the cabinets led by prime minister ...
